Crypto holders can earn yield on the digital assets in their account with Celsius, and can borrow fiat or stablecoins against their crypto collateral at the lowest interest rates in the space.  

 

The Celsius team is committed to doing good and doing well. We believe in the power of disruption and the importance of decentralization to create a new system that acts in the best interest of everyone. Each member of our team brings something unique and innovative to the table, but the common thread that links us together is our passion for blockchain, equality, and leading the next financial revolution that changes the equation to bring power back to the people.

job.title: Cardano DCF Consortium Manager
job.description:
In 2021, Cardano has achieved incredible success, but we are still early in this space and have a long way to go. A big component of the continued evolution of Cardano is IO Global’s efforts to fully open source and decentralize the core development of the platform and protocol. To do this, we will need to build a broad coalition and a consortium of highly qualified and reputable firms that can meaningfully contribute to this effort.

As Consortium Manager on the Decentralized Consortium Funding (DCF) team at IOG, you will be responsible for establishing a Consortium Membership Agreement using established frameworks and guidelines such as DESCA, facilitating consortium formation and overseeing consortium interactions before, during, and after launch. These responsibilities include working with The Cardano DCF Director to provide overall leadership of the entire consortium as well as administrative, financial, implementation, reporting, and technical oversight.

Your mission

  • Engage with Consortium Partners and ensure they receive all relevant updates. Anticipate their needs for information and partner with the DCF communications manager to develop an appropriate communications plan
  • Engage in Catalyst Townhall, After Townhall, and Catalyst Swarm Sessions to inform the Catalyst community of the progress of Consortium formation
  • Lead the drafting and dissemination of position papers, statements, reports, and releases on the consortium's engagements around the development of Cardano
  • Effectively manage partnerships between the different parties of the consortium to ensure smooth collaboration
  • Ensure regular and open/transparent communication between consortium partners
  • Convene and chair regular (e.g. fortnightly, quarterly) consortium steering committee meetings to discuss program and financial issues, disseminate minutes and follow up on action points
  • Promote harmonization of approaches and methodologies across all consortium partners by developing and monitoring use of common tools as well as creating opportunities for experience sharing and learning
  • Work closely with the Cardano DCF Director to develop and maintain a coherent consortium strategy across all partners.

Your expertise

  • Experience with DESCA, Horizon2020, LERU, and/or similar consortium frameworks
  • Excellent writing and language skills (Native English)
  • Good technical understanding (Experience in blockchain/crypto technologies preferred).

Location

IOG is a fully distributed organization and therefore this is a remote position. Due to team distribution we are ideally searching for someone in a Central European or Pacific Standard time zone.

All Colleagues

  • Flexible schedule
  • Remote work - ability to work anywhere
  • Laptop reimbursement
  • New starter package to buy hardware essentials (headphones, monitor, etc)
  • Learning & Development opportunities
  • Competitive PTO and Sick Leave plan

US Employees

  • Medical, Dental, and Vision benefits coverage through Anthem with 100% premium cost covered by IO Global for the employee and dependents
  • Health Savings Account
  • Life Insurance

UK Employees

  • Monthly Health Stipend to use towards any wellness or medical coverage/service
  • Pension

job.title: Go to Market Manager - Freelance
job.description:
SettleMint eliminates complexity in Enterprise blockchain development, deployment and integration. Our low-code Blockchain Platform as a Service (BPaaS) is recognised by Gartner and Everest Group as a leading technological solution for blockchain application development globally. Using our BPaaS solution enables our customers, to rapidly integrate blockchain into their digital transformation projects, to rapidly move from a blockchain concept to a fully integrated solution.

About SettleMint organisation and team:
SettleMint has offices in Belgium, UAE, India and Singapore. A culturally diverse team with deep industry experience in developing innovative and scalable blockchain developer tools. The team includes industry leading thinkers and doers who strive to extend SettleMint’s product leadership, bound together by the ambition to accelerate blockchain adoption globally. In addition to our in-house team, we work hand-in-hand with leading systems integrators active in the blockchain space to deliver end-to-end solutions to customers. We are currently a team of over 50 and are growing our engineering, solution architecture, client success and sales teams.

What’s the opportunity?

One of SettleMint’s flagship products is Databroker.global, a blockchain-supported decentralized data marketplace where buyers and sellers exchange data on a peer-to-peer basis. The data exchanged are put to use towards improving operational efficiencies, capturing new markets, and driving better decision making across industries and the public sector.

We are looking for an innovative, detail-oriented Go To Market Manager with strong business acumen for a 5-month mission where you will be leading the go-to-market of a data marketplace for the IOT sector.

In this pivotal role, you will be reporting directly to the head of marketing and become a key member of the project team. Your mission will be to take ownership and be responsible for the set up and the execution of the platform strategy, which includes the design and management of online and social campaigns, the set up of an industry segmentation, the development of customer personas and the orchestration of content marketing campaigns. Also, the monitoring and reporting of the campaign, the identification and resolution of issues, as well as adhering to contract specifications will be part of your responsibilities.

To be successful in this role, you should be an experienced and versatile project manager with excellent technical skills and sound knowledge of growth hacking techniques, as well as strong interpersonal and communication skills.


Requirements:

  • 3-5 years minimum experience in digital project management, with an expertise in go-to-market strategies, preferably in a start up environment where you had to make it happen.

  • An analytical mindset, you are comfortable working with Google Analytics or other reporting tools. You know what a market segmentation is and you are able to connect qualitative and quantitative data analysis and link them into a go-to-market strategy.

  • Tech savvy with a knowledge of growth hacking and SEO tools (Phantombuster, Sales Navigator, Lusha, Semrush…) ideally experienced with an integrated solution like Hubspot (another one is also ok).

  • Able to work independently or as part of a team and you have a high sense of ownership.

  • The ability to dream big but realize that achieving great goals often requires small operational steps that you will be happy to undertake.

  • Motivated to train yourself and curious to learn, you are eager to engage in a learning path where you will be continuously auto-challenging yourself, taking lessons from successes and failures.

  • You are proficient in Word, PowerPoint and at least one CMS platform that you have used extensively in the past. Familiarity with Hubspot is a plus, but not absolutely required.

  • An international experience in Africa is a plus.

  • Interest for new technologies in general and Blockchain in particular is definitely an asset.


Language:

Fluent (spoken and written) in English plus one other European language.

Employment Terms:

  • Freelancer for 2 to 3 days a week based in Belgium

  • Potential start early February 2022

  • 5 months contract to start with, potential to extend beyond if needed.

  • Remote to start, reporting to Belgium HQ


STRICTLY NO AGENCIES

Join Our Team

Genesis is expanding to solve some of the toughest challenges in digital asset financial markets.


About This Role – Social Media Strategist

We are looking for a social media strategist to help us deepen our engagement with our market and our community, and to leverage the Genesis brand.

Responsibilities

  • Promote and amplify the role of Genesis as a leading provider of institutional digital asset services.
  • Highlight Genesis’ deep market insight for a professional investor audience.
  • Help develop brand voice on social that speaks to both crypto native and traditional finance communities.
  • Assist the Head of Communications to incorporate messaging and brand advancement, including ensuring a consistent corporate narrative across the firm’s social media channels.
  • Manage polls and market surveys.
  • Keep track of and promote Genesis research, event participation, organizational developments.
  • Interact with other departments, especially compliance and legal.

  • Create and curate content for social posts and plan the social calendar.
  • Take a leadership role in the development and execution of media activity reports to management.
  • Build an active relationship with the firm’s external PR agency.


Requirements

  • 2-5+ years of experience speaking to an institutional audience in a regulated industry.
  • Experience driving a B2B brand’s social media and content strategy.
  • Experience overseeing the social media content production process for a brand, managing content closely.
  • Strong understanding of social media measurement and how to tie results back to business goals.
  • Has managed social media marketing programs/campaigns from conception to execution and reporting.
  • Has experience with paid social.
  • Experience building and managing timelines and developing/managing budgets.

Nice-to-haves

  • Familiarity with crypto concepts.
  • A deep passion for the socio-economic potential of the crypto industry.
  • Comfortable engaging with various crypto communities on Twitter/Discord
  • A strong team spirit and an eagerness to get things done.
  • A high degree of initiative and ability to think on one’s feet.
  • College degree or equivalent.
  • US-based (NY preferred).


Benefits

  • Comprehensive health, vision, dental and FSA benefits
  • Flexible time off


Why Genesis

Genesis is dedicated to creating best-in-class infrastructure for institutional investors, developing advanced products that lower barriers, increase profitability and broaden access. Our team has decades of experience at top Wall Street investment banks and Silicon Valley technology firms, and includes leading experts in blockchain, distributed computing, cryptography and cybersecurity.

→ We are a subsidiary of Digital Currency Group (DCG), the largest investor in the bitcoin and blockchain space.

→ We have an unparalleled global network at the intersection of data, finance and technology.


Accelerating Momentum

Our addressable market is expanding rapidly as new institutional investors enter the space. Recent results include:

→ 300%+ Y/Y trading volume growth

→ 400%+ Y/Y loan origination growth

→ 300%+ Y/Y active loan growth

→ 150%+ Q/Q derivatives transaction growth

Genesis invests in creating a welcoming environment where everyone can feel supported and connected at work.

→ We help employees develop a deep understanding of the problems we’re trying to solve.

→ We thrive on ideas driven by a broad range of perspectives.

→ We believe diverse teams lead to better products and bigger outcomes.
